official_title: A bill to extend until December 20, 1985, the trade adjustment assistance, certain medicare reimbursement provisions, and borrowing authority under the railroad unemployment insurance program.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to extend the trade adjustment assistance program until December 20, 1985. Amends the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to extend the borrowing authority under such Act until December 20, 1985. Amends the Emergency Extension Act of 1985 to extend certain Medicare hospital and physician payment provisions until December 20, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to extend until December 20, 1985, the trade adjustment assistance, certain medicare reimbursement provisions, and borrowing authority under the railroad unemployment insurance program.
